parts.text:
```json
{
  "application": "spack",
  "details": {
    "scheduler": "slurm",
    "spack_version": "0.17.2",
    "spack_instance_name": "cpu",
    "spack_instance_dir": "/cm/shared/apps/spack/0.17.2/cpu",
    "intel_license_file": "40000@elprado.sdsc.edu:40200@elprado.sdsc.edu",
    "spack_package": "mpip@3.5",
    "spack_compiler": "intel@19.1.3.304",
    "spack_variants": "~add_shared_target ~bfd ~demangling +libunwind +mpi_io +mpi_nbc +mpi_rma ~setjmp",
    "spack_dependencies": "^mvapich2@2.3.7/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' mvapich2@2.3.7 % ${SPACK_COMPILER})",
    "spack_spec": "${SPACK_PACKAGE} % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ${SPACK_VARIANTS} ${SPACK_DEPENDENCIES}",
    "resource_requirements": {
      "nodes": 1,
      "ntasks_per_node": 1,
      "cpus_per_task": 16,
      "memory": "32G",
      "time": "00:30:00"
    }
  }
}
```

The script is running the `spack` package manager to install the `mpip@3.5` package with specific compiler and variants. 

Here are the details of the software and resource requirements used in the script:

- **Scheduler:** slurm
- **Spack version:** 0.17.2
- **Spack instance:** cpu
- **Spack instance directory:** /cm/shared/apps/spack/0.17.2/cpu
- **Intel license file:** 40000@elprado.sdsc.edu:40200@elprado.sdsc.edu
- **Spack package:** mpip@3.5
- **Spack compiler:** intel@19.1.3.304
- **Spack variants:** ~add_shared_target ~bfd ~demangling +libunwind +mpi_io +mpi_nbc +mpi_rma ~setjmp
- **Spack dependencies:** ^mvapich2@2.3.7/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' mvapich2@2.3.7 % ${SPACK_COMPILER})
- **Spack spec:** ${SPACK_PACKAGE} % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ${SPACK_VARIANTS} ${SPACK_DEPENDENCIES}
- **Resource requirements:**
    - Nodes: 1
    - Ntasks per node: 1
    - Cpus per task: 16
    - Memory: 32G
    - Time: 00:30:00
